Jalan-jalan ke Batam, Sepatu Youtuber Mak Beti Hilang di Masjid
06 Nov 2019, 05:27 by Yogi Eka Sahputra, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Youtuber, Arif Muhammad yang menciptakan karakter Mak Beti tertimpa sial. Ia kehilangan sepatunya saat salat di Masjid Agung, Kota Batam, pada Senin sore, 4 November 2019. "Ampun, pulang salat, ilang sepatu," tulis Arif di Story Youtubernya.
Saat itu, Mak Beti tengah jalan-jalan di Batam untuk menyenangkan istrinya yang hamil atau babymoon. Youtuber dengan subscriber mencapai 7,2 juta ini menunjukkan lokasi sepatunya yang raib di atas tangga di pintu masuk masjid.
"Ayo dong masak pulang salat nyeker," tulisnya lagi sambil menunjukkan lokasi ia meletakkan sandal itu. Mak Beti selanjutnya membuka sandal jepit baru yang dibelinya setelah kecolongan sepatu.
Sebelumnya, Arif mengunggah status foto ikon "Welcome to Batam". Ia juga menuliskan kalimat "Enaknya di Batam ngapain ya?" tulis pria yang dulu pernah menjadi TKI di Abu Dhabi itu.
Meskipun sepatunya hilang Mak Beti tetap melanjutkan jalan-jalannya di Provinsi Kepulauan Kepri tersebut. Terlihat ia menikmati wisata Montigo Resort, di Sambau, Kecamatan Nongsa, Kota Batam, Kepri.
Beberapa netizen berkomentar di storynya. Beberapa warganet meminta Arif memaklumi kejadian seperti itu di Batam. "Jangan jadikan masalah, bila sendal atau sepatu kita hilang di masjid. Jadikan masalah bila sendal atau sepatu kita tidak pernah ke masjid," kata Bagus Tri Tubagus.
Kota Batam, merupakan salah satu tujuan kedua wisatawan mancanegara. Selain itu, pemerintah setempat mencanangkannya menjadi kota wisata yang awalnya merupakan kota industri. Hal itu dilakukan karena kian melemahnya pertumbuhan industri.
Tetapi wacana menjadikan Batam, kota wisata belum dibarengi pemerhatian khusus kepada destinasi. Beberapa tempat wisata salah satunya Masjid Agung masih terjadi pencurian, begitu juga beberapa pantai di Batam tidak terawat dengan bagus.

YOGI EKA SAHPUTRA
text:
Traveling to Batam, Mak Beti Youtuber shoes are missing at the mosque
Nov 6 2019, 05:27 by Yogi Eka Sahputra, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Youtuber, Arif Muhammad, who created the Mak Beti character, was unlucky. He lost his shoes during prayers at the Great Mosque, Batam City, on Monday afternoon, November 4, 2019. "Oh dear, go home praying, lose shoes," Arif wrote in his Youtuber Story.
At that time, Mak Beti was traveling in Batam to please his pregnant wife or babymoon. The YouTuber with 7.2 million subscribers shows the location of his missing shoes at the top of the stairs at the entrance of the mosque.
"Come on, cook home prayers nyeker," he wrote again, indicating the location where he put the sandals. Mak Beti then opened the new flip-flops that he bought after a shoe slip.
Previously, Arif uploaded the photo status icon "Welcome to Batam". He also wrote the phrase "What is good in Batam what are you doing?" wrote the man who used to be a migrant worker in Abu Dhabi.
Even though the shoes were lost Mak Beti continued to walk in the Riau Islands Province. He was seen enjoying the Montigo Resort tour, in Sambau, Nongsa District, Batam City, Riau Islands.
Some netizens commented on the story. Some citizens asked Arif to understand such an event in Batam. "Don't make trouble, if your sandals or shoes are lost in the mosque. Make it a problem if your sandals or shoes never go to the mosque," Bagus Tri Tubagus said.
Batam City, is one of the second destinations of foreign tourists. In addition, the local government declared it to be a tourist city which was originally an industrial city. This was done because of the increasingly weakening of industrial growth.
But the discourse to make Batam, a tourist city has not been accompanied by special attention to the destination. Some tourist attractions, one of which is the Great Mosque, still occurs theft, as well as several beaches in Batam that are not well maintained.

YOGI EKA SAHPUTRA
